document_data.name: Celvan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Crazy Celvan''' was a mad inhabitant of the [[Athkatla/River District|River District]] who could be found in the area's rooftop walkways in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|''There once was a child of...of...
Oh my...
I..I.. (giggle!) ..the gods speak! The speak and speak and speak and speak! To ME!! Hee hee...''|Crazy Celvan}}
document_data.Description: Celvan was a pale-skinned male [[gnome]] with gray hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Crazy Celvan dispensed cryptic yet prophetic limericks at passers by only to disappear a moment later with a giggle. The strange little man once had a run-in with [[Abdel Adrian]], a [[Bhaalspawn]], and his companions.
